extendedInfo.description: The Parrot Audio Suite app lets you simultaneously configure the settings for the Zik headphones and the Zikmu Solo speaker designed by Starck. Through a simple and intuitive user interface, you can easily: -Use preset equalizers or manually adjust the audio frequency -Adjust the volume of the Zikmu Solo speaker -Adapt the volume of the Zikmu Solo speaker according to the audio input sources -Adapt the volume of the Zikmu Solo speaker according to its position and the dimensions of the room -Connect simply and with full functionality using Wi-Fi -Browse through local networks to share and send music to the Zikmu Solo speaker -Keep your Zikmu Solo speaker updated with the latest firmware version The Parrot Audio Suite application allows to adjust the settings of your Parrot Zik wireless Headphones. - Configure the Parrot Concert Hall Effect, to enhance your listening experience, - Use a predefined equalizer or set your custom settings, - Activate or deactivate the Active Noise Cancellation - Check the battery level of your Zik - Keep your Zik updated with the latest software release - Get your Zik experience started with the embedded tutorial

reviews.title: You ruined it
reviews.comment: Every time I open the app it shows an ad for their speakers. Absolutely obnoxious. $400 headphones and you\'re going to force me to close out of an ad every time I open your ap. When are advertisers going to recognize that not all product advertisement is good product advertisement. I now associate your product with cheap nickle-and-diming schemes and will not be recommending or buying anything from you unless this is fixed promptly.
reviews.author: Charles Baker

reviews.title: what music app to use?
reviews.comment: Hi parrot zik, I am using poweramp but it seems to interfere with the parrot zik app as the music becomes weird (muffled, sounding bad).  What is your recommended app? Otherwise, the headphone is unusable with S4.  Please help.
reviews.author: Chad Manapat

reviews.title: HTC One incompatibility?
reviews.comment: English:  I acquired our Parrot Zik headphone 3 weeks ago and I so surprised to see that the sound is extremely poor when using bluetooth is activated in my HTC One phone ( so many saturation, a lot of noise, the volume decrease automatically )  Do you intend to fix this problem one day?  I love this headphone but it cost me 400\342\202\254, this problem really become unbearable.  This problem has been known for several months now :(  Regards
reviews.author: Sidney Curron

reviews.title: That\'s a good beginning but...
reviews.comment: The advertising at the beginning is very annoying noise reduction system should be boosted, because it\'s very weak. How can we call the parrot Zik a noise cancelation headphone?
reviews.author: Pierre Gourves

reviews.title: STOP displaying an annoying ad
reviews.comment: I hope it\'s some coding mistake and not.shoddy marketing. Please stop displaying an ad for your speakers that I have to manually close every time I open the app. If I wanted to buy something, I would have looked at your site or some genuine ad, not an app used to control my headphones.
reviews.author: Hyun Seok Lee

reviews.title: Great tech
reviews.comment: Well this application goes hand in hand with the headphones, . Great improvements to the application since launch and awesome concept of updating your headphones firmware using your phone!!  Innovative technology.
reviews.author: Andrew du Bois

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: My Motorola Xoom works fine, but Droid razr Maxx does not work properly. Phone connected to Zik, but sounds goes on speakerphone in telephone. What could be the problem?
reviews.author: Sane Black

reviews.title: Excellent indeed
reviews.comment: Love these headphones and App, they works great on my HTC One
reviews.author: Adrian Chandler

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I have the ZIK. These are awesome well worth the money.
reviews.author: Jamie Mitchell

reviews.title: Excellent app for an elegant device
reviews.comment: Love the headphones and the app gives you all the info and functionality you could ever need.
reviews.author: Calvin Brown

reviews.comment: How to use it at all?\nDoes it work with any headphones?\nWhats that on the left side on this app and where to get it?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Booom!
reviews.author: Peter Legnavsky

reviews.title: Great app, work very well.
reviews.comment: Simple to use and intelligent. Automatic updates and fun features.
reviews.author: Mike Bonetti

reviews.title: A lot of noise on HTC One
reviews.comment: The sound is unbearable on the HTC One. I had used this phone with other earphones and headphones without a problem. But when I used Parrot Zik with the HTC One, there\'s a lot of noise, sounding like static, sounds like the cones are breaking. There is no problem whenwith Parrot Zik is used on the iPod Touch or Samsung S3 (same audio files) , nor if other headphones is used with HTC One. The fatal combo is HTC One with Parrot Zik. I wonder if an update can fix this issue.
reviews.author: Justin Teo

reviews.title: Thanks for the update
reviews.comment: Thank you for finally supporting S4. Back to 5 stars.
reviews.author: Jacky Lee

reviews.title: HTC one
reviews.comment: The only issue I have found with using this on the HTC one is that the noise cancelling causes a humm when there is no music playing. Turn it off and it goes away. Updating was simple once connected to bluetooth. Once updated reboot for changes to work.
reviews.author: Keyth David

reviews.title: Excellent app for excellent headphones
reviews.comment: Works really well and gives good control and options for the audio in the parrot zik headphones.
reviews.author: Martin Holmgren

reviews.title: Finally fixed S4 issue!
reviews.comment: It took a while for the S4 fix, anyhow it now is working :-) have put my rating back up to 5 star.  Thanks
reviews.author: Rashid Aziz

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Stylish headphones are used daily, app is hardly ever used. H/w & s/w have always worked flawlessly for me.
reviews.author: Ben Walter

reviews.title: Finally works with S4!
reviews.comment: Great work! But pls make the zik generically support all devices! Waiting support for Atheros BT!
reviews.author: Eric Tan
